content:
Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 4, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft prismarine I need to place 4 prismarine shards in a 2x2 square on the crafting table. I will start by moving one shard to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 3, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}]
thought: The second shard needs to go to the right of the first one. Therefore I will move it to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}]
thought: The third shard needs to go below the first one. Therefore I will move it to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}]
thought: The fourth shard needs to go to the right of the third one. Therefore I will move it to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the prismarine by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
